alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL AITKIN, SOUTHWESTERN CASS AND CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM CDT... At 1215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Cuyuna, to near Pequot Lakes, to near Poplar, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nisswa around 1220 PM CDT. Gull Lake around 1225 PM CDT. Cuyuna around 1230 PM CDT. Crosby around 1235 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ironton, Baxter, Deerwood and Pillager. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass
